Increments the {{rlp|/|iterator}}.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} be the underlying pointer to enclosing {{tt|chunk_view}}.

@1@ Equivalent to:
{{source|1=
ranges::advance(*parent_-&gt;current_, parent_-&gt;remainder_, ranges::end(parent_-&gt;base_));
parent_-&gt;remainder_ = parent_-&gt;n_;
return *this;
}}
&lt;!----&gt;
Before invocation of this operator the expression {{c|1=*this == std::default_sentinel}} must be {{c/core|false}}.

@2@ Equivalent to {{c|++*this}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|*this}}
@2@ (none)
